title: Hello
text: 做为程序员，怎么能用现成的博客呢。只有用Github搭起的博客才显得高大上，才显得Geek。 <div class="ds-thread" data-thread-key="请将此处替换成文章在你的站点中的ID" data-title="请替换成文章的标题" data-url="请替换成文章的网址"></div> var duoshuoQuery = {short_name:”niumeng”}; (function() { var ds = document.createElement(‘script’); ds.type = ‘text/javascript’;ds.async = true; ds.src = (document.location.protocol == ‘https:’ ? ‘https:’ : ‘http:’) + ‘//static.duoshuo.com/embed.js’; ds.charset = ‘UTF-8’; (document.getElementsByTagName(‘head’)[0] || document.getElementsByTagName(‘body’)[0]).appendChild(ds); })();
